tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am 56year old women who unexpectedly started bleeding after 5 year of menopause. Though I undergo tests regularly but Dr‚Äôs I consulted never mentioned of my uterus wall was getting thicker from normal. They advised to get DNC , send piece of uterus for testing and post result analyze what need to be done and my condition was deteriorating amid circumstances every day.                                              But then I realised at my age why would I be requiring cleaning and testing of uterus when I can simply get it removed. I was recommended to Dr.Mita Verma . I was frightened and anxious as every doc. I had met was advising the same above but to contrary she not only assured me  surgeryfor removal of uterus would be best course moreover  it should have been the first choice of every doc. Given my age and situation. Any delay in surgery would trigger chances of uterus cancer. Dr. Verma gave her undivided attention during the time of surgery and post surgery whenever I visit her. Till date she is so forth coming in knowing my progress.                   Ladies when it come to health be very cautious. There are some docs who will take you for ride at the cost of your health and will only prescribe medicine and not really heal you. Be careful in choosing your doctor. I am happy to recommend Dr Verma to others and while doing so I am going one step ahead by recommending  a great human being .  I wish others can experience your care and expertise as a doctor as I have . It‚Äôs pleasure to know you doctor .
reply_text: Always for you. I am  touched by the appreciation and truly kind words. And the way you  have  narrated  your  feeling and problems

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
‚ÄúGod sends angels when we are in trouble‚Äù I experienced this and met this angel Dr Meeta Verma, a brilliant doctor when I was detected with 7.5 cm long fibroid and enlarged uterus. When others were suggesting open surgery , she removed fibroids and uterus through laproscopy with her magical hands. She deals with the patient like a psychologist as well. She gave me all strength and confidence that made my recovery so smooth.
Thank you so much Dr Meeta Verma. I simply love you and believe you more than myself. You are a genuine soul and excellent gynaecologist.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
** **** ***** * *** ** *** **** ************* * **** **** ****** ** ***** **** I reside in Gurgaon and visited 3-4 Gynaecologists here for my pregnancy in the top hospitals. However, I was not satisfied, nor I was given proper medication. I was misguided by a doctor here who works in a top hospital (I do not wish to name) last year. The procedures done were just not satisfactory, and it landed up spoiling my health further.

Then, one of my family member, referred Dr Mita (she is in Moolchand Hospital and has a clinic in Lajpat Nagar, Delhi). I met her and the way she explained things (considering first pregnancy), gave me medication, took extra care was incredible. She doesn't recommend extra or unnecessary tests, and always gives logic on what and why she is recommending any procedure or test. She is professional in her approach, yet personal if you are stressed (yes, this is common in pregnancy!). I have been visiting her for 1.5 years, and finally only because of her guidance and support, I‚Äôm blessed with a baby boy. She isn‚Äôt just a doctor for me, but a well-wisher. On my delivery, she was equally happy, like my family. I will recommend her to everyone who is planning their family, or even have issues related. *** ** *** *********** ***************

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
In some other hospital Uterus removal surgery was performed a couple of years back , but after a few months the flesh started protruding downwards. Consulted many Gynecologists but none could suggest best solution ( for the problems of  Uterus / Uterine Prolapse Problem, Vault Repair and Providing Mesh and Posterior Repair) with regards to understanding complication of the case and after surgery results. Coincidentally, one of relatives had similar problem and she was doing fine after many years of the surgery performed by Dr. Mita Verma. It gave additional trust to me too and so decided to consult her. After necessary diagnosis underwent  laparoscopy surgery. Now within few months recovered and it seems I had taken the right decision.
*** **** *** **** ***** *** **** ********* ** *** ***** *** she was friendly before surgery and on followup visits also * **** *** **** ************* *** ********* 

I thank Dr. Mita Verma not only for getting me rid of complicated gyne problems but also for her friendly behavior.
reply_text: Thanks for the kind words..Take care

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** **** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** Her support and guidance led us to have a baby boy recently. We have been trying for the past two years, however due to some complications I wasn‚Äôt able to conceive. There were a number of doctors we approached, and we spent a lot of money on tests and diagnosis. We met Dr. Mita after one of our colleagues mentioned her to us. My endometriosis was treated by her, and then active treatment for pregnancy was begun. *** ***** ******** *********** ****** *** ** **** ************* *** gives extra care to each of her patients. We trusted her and followed her instructions religiously. By God‚Äôs grace we have become parents of a beautiful baby. For us, Dr. Mita is like a mother. She is kind, humble* ************** and always polite when it comes to answering questions. Like a mother, she has a good reason for being a little strict. This is her love and passion for her patients. We are sincerely thankful to her for making this possible.

review: It's been five years but I always remember my Dr. Mita Verma as Bible. She was saviour of my 5 year old son. I had placenta abruption and high blood pressure. She is very compassionate and loving and it is clear from her matra which you see everywhere, I serve, He cures. Be the same always doctor. review:

Recovered well in time with proper medication and expert guidance from the doctor. She made an intricate procedure look very easy. Highly recommend her.

tags: Wait time,
review: My laproscopic hysterectomy was done by Dr. Mita Verma. She has been my gynac since the birth of my son in 2012. She was aware of all the medical complications that I have. I am allergic to different groups of medicines (as I had TEN) however she is the only doctor who I could trust to take care of this surgery. She has been doing laproscopic surgery since it started in India. That is why I feel she is one of the best in this procedure...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Gynae Problems,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Fibroid Removal,
review:
*** ** *** **** ****** *** ******* ** *** ********* *** ***** *** **** ******* *** **** ** *** ** *** **** ************ *** ****** ** ******** ******** ****** I was diogonised with multiple fibroids before my pregnancy with jaundice and other sever infections and was worried about my delivery, Dr Mita's treatment helped me and my baby to overcome all the issues infact i had a normal delivery which other Doctors have deneid at one time.
She understands the patient mental status and counsels them as well, I have not seen any Dr spending this much time with each patient like she does and ensures that she listens to patients queries. She is always available no matter what time it is unlike other doctors who not even share the direct contact details and spend not more than 5 min with patients. She never push you to go for unnecessary tests and will prescribe the required ones only. I am seeing her from many years now and strongly recommend her, specially for complex cases as she is experienced and have extremely good knowledge. I am blessed and happy that i have been treated by Dr Mita. 
Thanks and god bless you maam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am  writing this feedback  in reference to share my experience for Dr . Mita Verma. I know her personally from last 7-8 yrs she is very caring & develops a friendly relation with her patients ,listens to them patiently and then advise the medication accordingly. Initially when i visited her in order to conceive my thyroid level was extremely high & was brought in control with help of medicines  advised by her. Post that i conceived & my son Anay was Born on 14th Feb with all the care provided by our loving Doctor. We feel like family whenever visiting her.There are lot many things which i would like to share but due to time constraint here my friends this all i could write.

So if you are looking for Good gynecologist i would strongly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My wife and I wish to express our heartfelt appreciation and gratitude for the understanding, kindness and excellent care provided to her since she came to Dr. Mita during her pregnancy in 2007. She has always helped her in coming out of her agony/problem and to face the Fear of Illness with strength and Trust in Recovery  with hope.

Dr. Mita has always spend time to look beyond the medical reports and understand the suffering and pain that my wife was going through due to the complications during pregnancy, later in facing problems of Rheumatoid arthritis and even during sudden loss of her mother.

Other doctors simply treat their patients with medicines but forget to do the most important thing which Dr. Mita do i.e. help them to move on with their lives with motivating words and inspirational thoughts.

We feel really blessed to have a doctor like her, whom we can contact for any problem without hesitation.

May God bless Dr. Mita and her service to fellow human beings!
 
Thanks
reply_text: Thanks dear, from the bottom of my heart for the kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Mita is a very friendly and considerate doctor. She understands your problem in detail and after thorough analysis she advises for treatment. I had severe and painful fibroid and she suggested surgery to remove the same. After removal of it i.e. Fibroid treatment via Laparascopic Myometomy, I dont feel anymore heaviness or bloatedness. I have recovered in few days all because of proper diet, medicine and right approach as advised by doctor.Sincere thanks and regards to such a talented doctor. Thanks for being there mam..

review: I had a really bad experience with dr. Mita, first of all we waited for so long but mam was telling non related stories with other patients, secondly it is a generall role when you have appointment with a doctor and the doctor writes some medicines and tests for you then you should pay the fees but when you are back with the reports then there is no charges but madam charged as 500 INR. That really annoyed me.
reply_text: Dear Practo user.. , being a gynaecologist & Obstetrician I can't  give anyone fixed timed appointment.Sometimes to some patients, talking about my experience with other patients is also very important as the doctor  need s to council her patients in many different aspects of her life especially dealing with infertility etc.Secondly follow up visit is always chargeble like all physician s do,for giving  opinion after seeing the reports even if the patient comes on next day.
